content: Please tell me whether it's possible to create a quick reference for this type of page, which can be edited with a word processor, to highlight some of the contents, or remove those which are obvious to me, the user. Wordpad would be the most desirable for this. Many thanks

title: Firefox not loading
content: When I go to load firefox I get the error message that says that it is already loaded. Task Manager shows that Firefox is loaded three times even though I clicked on the icon in the tray only once. Due to this I cannot get on Firefox. It is the browser that I always use. It worked yesterday.
